conbody.p: A label is a non-editable text field. It is often used to display text next to an input field.

The required attribute of the label has an impact on the display of the label at runtime. The attribute is set to the following default values during the drag-and-drop of an attribute:
Dataset class attribute refers to required property
a class attribute marked as Required Required = true
a class attribute marked as Not required Required = false
an association marked as Required Required = true
an association marked as Not required Required = false
